author: Eliana Dockterman
title: 14 Podcasts for Social Distancing, From Home Cooking to Homeschooling
description: From understanding the pandemic to tackling homeschooling, keeping up with the election to finding distractions, here's what to listen to.
content: I used to dip in and out of podcasts during moments of transition—on the subway heading to work, while walking to meet a friend for dinner, sitting in the waiting room of my dentist’s office. I can’t do any of those things anymore, but my craving for podcasts… [+11055 chars]
